product.title: Cherry Blossom Tree House Spring & Summer 2-in-1 Micro Building Set | NEW
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • Are you a fan of cherry blossom season?

    Experience the mesmerizing beauty of the changing seasons with our exclusive Sakura Tree House Building Set. Crafted with precision and inspired by the elegance of Japanese culture, this 2-in-1 masterpiece captures the essence of both springtime blossoms and the rich hues of summer leaves.

    🌸 Measurements: 29 x 22 x 32cm
    🌸 Includes 3196 pieces
    🌸 2-in-1 interchangeable leaves
    ⭐ Compatible with micro building blocks
    ⭐ Not compatible with leading blocks of standard size (16mm)
    📦 Excludes original box to protect the environment. For further details please see below.*

    Step into a world where cherry blossoms paint the air with soft hues of pink, creating an enchanting canopy over the tree house. This micro-building set will transports you to the tranquility of a springtime haven once you complete the build. As the seasons transition, transform your Tree House into a captivating summer wonderland.


    A great way to introduce friends to building blocks

    Whether you're a seasoned building block architect or a beginner looking for a new adventure, these micro-building sets offer a satisfying challenge and a rewarding outcome. Share the joy of building with friends and family, creating a miniature world of tea-sipping joy.

    Micro Blocks: Smaller than the traditional building block.

     


    Features

    ⭐ 100% premium quality (ABS) plastic
    ⭐ Sharp brilliant colors and solid feel
    ⭐ Challenging and rewarding to stimulate all brains
    ⭐ High-quality durable non-toxic green material

    WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD - Contains small parts; not suitable for children under 6 years old unless there is adult supervision.

     

  • Do you ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to over 300 countries and are proud to provide free shipping to the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, and many European countries.

    What are the blocks made from?     All our building blocks are manufactured from a High-Quality Premium strong, resilient plastic known as acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS) and will stand the test of time and provide hours of fun building their own creations

    Does this help with stress and development?     Our building blocks are a great way to relieve stress and engage in meaningful and joyful conversations. As children comment on their building creations, they develop important communication skills including the ability to explain ideas, describe their work, talk about the process and verbalize challenges that they had along the way. 

    Are these compatible with other leading brands? Yes, these are microblocks so they are compatible with leading micro blocks. 


    CHOKING HAZARD: Small parts. Not for children under 6 years old

     

  • Free Tracked Shipping to the United States, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Spain, France, Netherlands, and many more.

    Small shipping fee to Canada, Italy, Switzerland, Norway, Sweden, Denmark, Ireland, Finland, United Arab Emirates, and a few other countries.

    Packaging time: Est. 1-4 Business days
    Shipping time: Est. 5-15 Business days

    For more details and the latest shipping updates please click here: Shipping Policy.
